meanings.sent1: In the garden, I saw beautiful soroses blooming together.
meanings.sent2: The soroses in the bouquet added a lovely touch to the table.
meanings.sent3: The soroses seemed to be having a party, all gathered in one place.
meanings.sent4: The soroses on the tree looked like a colorful explosion frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The sweet fragrance of the soroses filled the air, making it feel like a dream.

meanings.definition: A type of fruit cluster in which multiple flowers fuse together to form a single mass.
meanings.sent1: The soroses on the vine were a sight to behold, a cluster of tiny fruits.
meanings.sent2: The market had fresh soroses on display, each cluster bursting with flavor.
meanings.sent3: The soroses rolled off the table, creating a fruity avalanche on the floor.
meanings.sent4: She compared the soroses to a family, each fruit sticking together through thick and thin.
meanings.sent5: The soroses hanging from the tree looked like a bunch of colorful grapes, tempting anyone passing by.
